function.name: curl_getinfo
function.description: Get information regarding a specific transfer.

function.name: curl_error
function.description: Return a string contain the last error for the current session.

function.name: curl_errno
function.description: Return an integer containing the last error number.

function.name: curl_setopt
function.description: Set an option for a CURL transfer.

function.name: curl_setopt
function.description: Set an option for a CURL transfer.

function.name: curl_copy_handle
function.description: Copy a cURL handle along with all of its preferences.

function.name: curl_multi_add_handle
function.description: Add a normal cURL handle to a cURL multi handle.

function.name: curl_multi_close
function.description: Close a set of cURL handles.

function.name: curl_multi_exec
function.description: Run the sub-connections of the current cURL handle.

function.name: curl_multi_getcontent
function.description: Return the content of a cURL handle if CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER is set.

function.name: curl_multi_info_read
function.description: Get information about the current transfers.

function.name: curl_multi_init
function.description: Returns a new cURL multi handle.

function.name: curl_multi_remove_handle
function.description: Remove a multi handle from a set of cURL handles.

function.name: curl_multi_select
function.description: Get all the sockets associated with the cURL extension, which can then be "selected=".
